SkinPlace Extension: Enhance Your Steam Experience with Security and Style

Our SkinPlace extension is designed to streamline your interactions with Steam, safeguard your inventory, and do it all with elegance and ease.

In the first version of our extension, we're excited to offer the following features:

Scam Offer Detection: Our extension automatically identifies and highlights potential scam offers on your trade page. It distinguishes between offers sent by scammers and legitimate offers from SkinPlace, ensuring that you always know which trades are safe and directly associated with our platform, protecting you from malicious actors.

Automatic Scam Offer Cancellation: With the appropriate settings enabled, the extension can automatically cancel scam offers that are not related to Skin.Place. This feature helps prevent bot swaps during transactions, adding an extra layer of security.

Real-time Trade Notifications: Receive instant alerts when a new trade offer from SkinPlace arrives, so you never miss a deal.

Privacy Policy https://skin.place/en/privacypolicy

Description of the requested permissions:
*: //*.steampowered.com/* & *: //steamcommunity.com/* - display of various extension functionality on steamcommunity and steampowered sites
*: //steamrep.com/* - getting public information about the user profile (trade ban / VAC ban / community ban)
*: //skin.place/* - using the function of communication with skin.place to create trade offers
